1.18.2.1.1.0a: fix issues with how class properties are granted
1.18.2.1.1.0b: fix bug that caused attributes to be lost on respawn
1.18.2.1.1.1: fix, finish and enable class selection gui, fix some crashes when using /pickClass
1.18.2.1.1.1a: fix crash when loading invalid skills
1.18.2.1.1.2: add stamina and health display to class gui, add gui background boxes
1.18.2.1.1.3: add dynamic attribute system, attribute icons and epic fight animations, add data/resource pack to config with default class data
1.18.2.1.1.3b: fix compatibility with paragliders and double stamina paragliders
1.18.2.1.1.3c: fix stamina sometimes being reset on respawn
1.18.2.1.1.4a: rework text line calculation to fix issues displaying large characters in class descriptions
1.18.2.1.1.4b: reopen class selection screen every tick if not already open to prevent invincible players
1.18.2.1.1.5: add the ability for classes to run commands, rework gui, add extra attribute client properties
